name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Honor of the Empire
detailed_description:
World War I began from the territory of Austria-Hungary, and the soldiers of the empire sacrifised their lives for the Emperor, fighting on a huge front against all the Entente countries. The large population and developed industry, the help of a powerful ally, allowed to defend on the eastern front, actively advance in the Balkans and achieve successes in Italy.
In this campaign, you will go through the horrors of the siege of Przemyśl, bloody battles on Isonzo's banks, the chilling cold of Tyrol and the heat of the Romanian plains. For the King and the Emperor!
about_the_game:
World War I began from the territory of Austria-Hungary, and the soldiers of the empire sacrifised their lives for the Emperor, fighting on a huge front against all the Entente countries. The large population and developed industry, the help of a powerful ally, allowed to defend on the eastern front, actively advance in the Balkans and achieve successes in Italy.
In this campaign, you will go through the horrors of the siege of Przemyśl, bloody battles on Isonzo's banks, the chilling cold of Tyrol and the heat of the Romanian plains. For the King and the Emperor!
short_description: In the Austria-Hungary campaign You will go through the horrors of the siege of Przemyśl, bloody battles on Isonzo's banks, the chilling cold of Tyrol and the heat of the Romanian plains.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1 and higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Hardware Accelerator Card Required – 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible 128 MB Video Memory. ATI® Radeon® 9600 or Nvidia® GeForce® 5900
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel Quad Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X version 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X version 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Hardware Accelerator Card Required - OpenGL 3.0 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better
